select-device.fluidnc: Use this option if you want to install, upgrade or configure your FluidNC controller.
select-device.fluiddial: Use this option if you want to install or upgrade your FluidDial (CYD or M5Dial) pendant.

connection.title: FluidNC 在线安装配置引导
connection.description: 此工具将易于在设备上安装或升级 FluidNC 。请将设备连接并按 Connect 继续。

home.description: 您已连接到设备，请可以进行下面的操作
home.error-while-booting: 启动时发生错误，可能是由于配置无效。

file-browser.title: 内置文件
file-browser.config-missing: 缺少配置文件“{{configFilename}}”，是否要创建它？

terminal.title: 终端
terminal.restart-description: 通过设置 DTR/RTS 在控制器上进行硬重置
terminal.reset-description: Resets the controller with a 0x18 command
terminal.startup-description: 获取初始化设备状态日志

connection.title: FluidDial 在线安装程序
connection.description: This tool will make it easy to install or upgrade FluidDial on your pendant. Plug in your pendant and press Connect to continue.

firmware.install-description: 请选择你想要在控制器上安装的固件版本。

bootloader.not-active: 引导加载器未激活 - 请按下 BOOT 开关

unsupported.title: 浏览器不支持
unsupported.description: 您当前的浏览器不支持，请使用 Chrome、Edge 或 Opera 代替。

installer.error-reconnecting: 重新连接时发生错误，请重启设备
installer.done-description: 控制器已成功安装，可以开始使用。
installer.confirm-installation-description: 将擦除设备并安装{{release}}版本的固件
installer.installation-speed-help: Some controllers need to be installed at a lower speed. If you are experiencing problems you can try and decrease the speed.
installer.select-image-description1: If you have downloaded a package manually you can flash the image from here.
installer.select-image-description2: Select the firmware.bin file to flash the controller with.

lost-connection.description: Lost the connection to the controller

install.install-description: The controller does not seem to have FluidNC installed, do you wish to install it?

terminal.open-terminal-description: Open a serial terminal to your controller

donate.description: 请考虑通过以下链接向 FluidNC 项目捐款，以使其继续发展。
